dogs.name: Pippi
facts: Pippi likes to travel and visit.

dogs.name: Patches
facts: Patches loves carryout food, especially pork fried rice.
Patches likes going on adventurous hikes and going for a burger afterwards.
Patches is the president of the Good Girls club.

dogs.name: Marley
facts: Marley loves all humans and brings them joy.
Marley lays on the couch after everyone leaves. They know she was there because it's still warm when they return
Marley is always happy and likes to get dressed up
